page.title: 06The Welsh language
page.content: Many years ago Welsh was the first language of the majority of the people ofRhos.The area was renowned for it's deep involvment in the culture of Wales.Many brilliant scholars emerged from the village of Rhos, to take up important posts both in WALES and ENGLAND.Since then Rhos has seen a deterioration of both it's language and culture due to a number of reasons.The decline of the industry and consequently a movement out of Rhos to look for employment elsewhere was a major factor. The decline in the language was due to many reasons-important jobs in England,the idea that the English language was essential for people to get on in society.
